mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`BB`, t1.`BBH`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`JB`, t1.`KCBM`, t1.`KCJS`, t1.`KCLB`, t1.`KCXS`, t31.`NR`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t11.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t1.`PXMB`, t1.`SFFC`, t1.`SFGX`, t1.`SKFS`, t1.`TRMCOURSESYSTEMID`, t31.`TRMCOURSESYSTEMNAME`, t1.`TRMTRAINAGENCYID`, t21.`TRMTRAINAGENCYNAME`, t1.`TRMTRAINCOURSEID`, t1.`TRMTRAINCOURSENAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_TRMTRAINCOURSE` t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t11 ON t1.ORMORGID = t11.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_TRMTRAINAGENCY t21 ON t1.TRMTRAINAGENCYID = t21.TRMTRAINAGENCYID LEFT JOIN T_TRMCOURSESYSTEM t31 ON t1.TRMCOURSESYSTEMID = t31.TRMCOURSESYSTEMID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.BB, t1.BBH, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE, t1.JB, t1.KCBM, t1.KCJS, t1.KCLB, t1.KCXS, t31.NR, t1.ORMORGID, t11.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME, t1.PXMB, t1.SFFC, t1.SFGX, t1.SKFS, t1.TRMCOURSESYSTEMID, t31.TRMCOURSESYSTEMNAME, t1.TRMTRAINAGENCYID, t21.TRMTRAINAGENCYNAME, t1.TRMTRAINCOURSEID, t1.TRMTRAINCOURSENAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_TRMTRAINCOURSE t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t11 ON t1.ORMORGID = t11.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_TRMTRAINAGENCY t21 ON t1.TRMTRAINAGENCYID = t21.TRMTRAINAGENCYID LEFT JOIN T_TRMCOURSESYSTEM t31 ON t1.TRMCOURSESYSTEMID = t31.TRMCOURSESYSTEMID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1
